name: Hunting Season - Birds Sniper
description:
Hunting Season - Birds Sniper is most adventurous flying eagle in bird hunting season. The sniper shooter with the sniper shooting will shoot the jungle bird hunting season. The jungle shooter was waiting for the Eagle bird hunting season because the bird hunter loves the sniper shooting of wild life including wild birds and wild eagle.
Features
- Stunning birds and high-quality 3D graphics
- Realistic controls for best shooting experience
- 10 exciting and challenging bird hunting missions
- Amazing sniper rifle with scope to zoom in and zoom out
